thread.title: Robber busted in S.F. Muni bus robberies while trying to transfer
thread.title_full: Robber busted in S.F. Muni bus robberies while trying to transfer - San Francisco Chronicle

author: Kale Williams
title: Robber busted in S.F. Muni bus robberies while trying to transfer
text:
Photo: Paul Chinn, The Chronicle In this file photo, a Muni bus rolls southbound on Van Ness Avenue in San Francisco, Calif. on Thursday, Aug. 27, 2015. On Tuesday evening, a man allegedly robbed two people at gunpoint on a Muni bus, but was arrested when he tried to use a different bus to make his getaway. In this file photo, a Muni bus rolls southbound on Van Ness Avenue...
A man who allegedly robbed two people for their cell phones at gunpoint on a Muni bus in San Francisco Tuesday evening was arrested after he transferred to different bus to make his getaway, authorities said. In this file photo, a Muni bus rolls southbound on Van Ness Avenue in San Francisco, Calif. on Thursday, Aug. 27, 2015. On Tuesday evening, a man allegedly robbed two people at gunpoint on a Muni bus, but was arrested when he tried to use a different bus to make his getaway.
